decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-abbf293d-7fff-29b9-7d79-0aacb04bf796"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The proposed development, in the absence of a legal agreement to secure car-free housing,&nbsp; and lack of adequate information to determine if cycle parking can be provided, would be likely to promote the use of non-sustainable modes of transport and contribute to air pollution and congestion in the surrounding area,&nbsp; contrary to part MA,.2(2)(a) of Class MA, Part 3, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).</span></span><br></p>

<p>Without evidence to the contrary in the form of an acoustic survey and mitigation measures,&nbsp; the&nbsp;proposed residential units would suffer from poor living conditions as a result of noise and disturbance from the adjacent commercial uses,&nbsp; contrary to MA.2(2)(d) of Class MA, Part 3, Schedule 2 of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).&nbsp;</p>
description: Prior Approval (Class MA) for change of use from commercial, business and service use (Class E) to 3 residential self-contained units (Class C3).
